results.description: The home of Companies House  on GOV.UK. We incorporate and dissolve limited companies. We register company information and make it available to the public.
results.title: Companies House

results.description: The home of HM Revenue & Customs on GOV.UK. We are the UK’s tax, payments and customs authority, and we have a vital purpose: we collect the money that pays for the UK’s public services and help families and individuals with targeted financial support. We do this by being impartial and increasingly effective and efficient in our administration. We help the honest majority to get their tax right and make it hard for the dishonest minority to cheat the system.
results.title: HM Revenue & Customs

results.description: The home of Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency on GOV.UK. We’re the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA), holding over 48 million driver records and over 40 million vehicle records. We collect around £6 billion a year in vehicle excise duty (VED).
results.title: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency

results.description: The home of Valuation Office Agency on GOV.UK. The Valuation Office Agency (VOA) gives the government the valuations and property advice needed to support taxation and benefits.
results.title: Valuation Office Agency

results.description: The home of HM Land Registry on GOV.UK. We register the ownership of land and property in England and Wales.
results.title: HM Land Registry

results.description: The home of The Charity Commission on GOV.UK. We register and regulate charities in England and Wales, to ensure that the public can support charities with confidence.
results.title: The Charity Commission

results.description: The home of UK Visas and Immigration on GOV.UK. UK Visas and Immigration is responsible for making millions of decisions every year about who has the right to visit or stay in the country, with a firm emphasis on national security and a culture of customer satisfaction for people who come here legally.
results.title: UK Visas and Immigration

results.description: The home of Disclosure and Barring Service on GOV.UK. The Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) helps employers make safer recruitment decisions and prevent unsuitable people from working with vulnerable groups, including children. It replaces the Criminal Records Bureau (CRB) and Independent Safeguarding Authority (ISA).
results.title: Disclosure and Barring Service

results.description: The home of Highways England on GOV.UK. Highways England operates, maintains and improves England’s motorways and major A roads.
results.title: Highways England

results.description: The home of Ofsted on GOV.UK. Ofsted is the Office for Standards in Education, Children’s Services and Skills. We inspect and regulate services that care for children and young people, and services providing education and skills for learners of all ages.
results.title: Ofsted

results.description: The home of Department for Work and Pensions on GOV.UK. The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare, pensions and child maintenance policy. As the UK’s biggest public service department it administers the State Pension and a range of working age, disability and ill health benefits to around 18 million claimants and customers.
results.title: Department for Work and Pensions

results.description: The home of Foreign & Commonwealth Office on GOV.UK. The FCO promotes the United Kingdom’s interests overseas, supporting our citizens and businesses around the globe.
results.title: Foreign & Commonwealth Office

results.description: The home of Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs on GOV.UK. We are the UK government department responsible for safeguarding our natural environment, supporting our world-leading food and farming industry, and sustaining a thriving rural economy. Our broad remit means we play a major role in people’s day-to-day life, from the food we eat, and the air we breathe, to the water we drink.

organisations.logo_formatted_title:
Department
for Environment
Food & Rural Affairs
organisations.title: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

results.title: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

results.description: The home of Home Office on GOV.UK. The first duty of the government is to keep citizens safe and the country secure. The Home Office has been at the front line of this endeavour since 1782. As such, the Home Office plays a fundamental role in the security and economic prosperity of the United Kingdom.
results.title: Home Office

results.description: The home of Department for Education on GOV.UK. The Department for Education is responsible for children’s services and education, including early years, schools, higher and further education policy, apprenticeships and wider skills in England.
results.title: Department for Education

results.description: The home of HM Passport Office on GOV.UK. HM Passport Office is the sole issuer of UK passports and responsible for civil registration services through the General Register Office.
results.title: HM Passport Office

results.description: The home of Environment Agency on GOV.UK. We work to create better places for people and wildlife, and support sustainable development.
results.title: Environment Agency

results.description: The home of Intellectual Property Office on GOV.UK. The Intellectual Property Office (IPO) is the official UK government body responsible for intellectual property (IP) rights including patents, designs, trade marks and copyright.
results.title: Intellectual Property Office

results.description: The home of Ministry of Defence on GOV.UK. We protect the security, independence and interests of our country at home and abroad. We work with our allies and partners whenever possible. Our aim is to ensure that the armed forces have the training, equipment and support necessary for their work, and that we keep within budget.
results.title: Ministry of Defence

results.description: The home of Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency on GOV.UK. We carry out driving tests, approve people to be driving instructors and MOT testers, carry out tests to make sure lorries and buses are safe to drive, carry out roadside checks on drivers and vehicles, and monitor vehicle recalls.
results.title: Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency

results.description: The home of Public Health England on GOV.UK. We exist to protect and improve the nation’s health and wellbeing, and reduce health inequalities.
results.title: Public Health England

results.description: The home of Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency on GOV.UK. The Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency regulates medicines, medical devices and blood components for transfusion in the UK.

organisations.title: Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency

results.title: Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency

results.description: The home of Department of Health and Social Care on GOV.UK. We support ministers in leading the nation’s health and social care to help people live more independent, healthier lives for longer.

organisations.title: Department of Health and Social Care

results.title: Department of Health and Social Care

results.description: The home of Legal Aid Agency on GOV.UK. We provide civil and criminal legal aid and advice in England and Wales to help people deal with their legal problems.
results.title: Legal Aid Agency

results.description: The home of Civil Service Fast Track Apprenticeship on GOV.UK. The Fast Track is a two-year Level 4 apprenticeship: a rewarding alternative to university with a competitive starting salary.
results.title: Civil Service Fast Track Apprenticeship

results.description: The home of Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy on GOV.UK. We are building an economy that works for everyone, so that there are great places in every part of the UK for people to work and for businesses to invest, innovate and grow.

organisations.logo_formatted_title:
Department for
Business, Energy
& Industrial Strategy
organisations.title: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy

results.title: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy

results.description: The home of Department for Transport on GOV.UK. We work with our agencies and partners to support the transport network that helps the UK’s businesses and gets people and goods travelling around the country. We plan and invest in transport infrastructure to keep the UK on the move.
results.title: Department for Transport

results.description: The home of Department for International Development on GOV.UK. The Department for International Development (DFID) leads the UK’s work to end extreme poverty. We are tackling the global challenges of our time including poverty and disease, mass migration, insecurity and conflict. Our work is building a safer, healthier, more prosperous world for people in developing countries and in the UK too.
results.title: Department for International Development

results.description: The home of Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government on GOV.UK. The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government’s (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

organisations.logo_formatted_title:
Ministry of Housing,
Communities &
Local Government
organisations.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government

results.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government

results.description: The home of HM Courts & Tribunals Service on GOV.UK. HM Courts & Tribunals Service is responsible for the administration of criminal, civil and family courts and tribunals in England and Wales.
results.title: HM Courts & Tribunals Service

results.description: The home of Innovate UK on GOV.UK. We are the UK’s innovation agency.
results.title: Innovate UK

results.description: The home of Office of the Public Guardian on GOV.UK. The Office of the Public Guardian (OPG) protects people in England and Wales who may not have the mental capacity to make certain decisions for themselves, such as about their health and finance.
results.title: Office of the Public Guardian

results.description: The home of Defence Science and Technology Laboratory on GOV.UK. The Defence Science and Technology Laboratory (Dstl) ensures that innovative science and technology contribute to the defence and security of the UK.
results.title: Defence Science and Technology Laboratory

results.description: The home of The Insolvency Service on GOV.UK. We are a Government agency that helps to deliver economic confidence by supporting those in financial distress, tackling financial wrongdoing and maximising returns to creditors.
results.title: The Insolvency Service

results.description: The home of Ministry of Justice on GOV.UK. The Ministry of Justice is a major government department, at the heart of the justice system. We work to protect and advance the principles of justice. Our vision is to deliver a world-class justice system that works for everyone in society.
results.title: Ministry of Justice

results.description: The home of Rural Payments Agency on GOV.UK. We pay out over £2 billion each year to support a thriving farming and food sector.
results.title: Rural Payments Agency

results.description: The home of Prime Minister's Office, 10 Downing Street on GOV.UK. 10 Downing Street is the official residence and the office of the British Prime Minister. The office helps the Prime Minister to establish and deliver the government’s overall strategy and policy priorities, and to communicate the government’s policies to Parliament, the public and international audiences.
results.title: Prime Minister's Office, 10 Downing Street

results.description: The home of Crown Commercial Service on GOV.UK. The Crown Commercial Service (CCS) brings together policy, advice and direct buying; providing commercial services to the public sector and saving money for the taxpayer.
results.title: Crown Commercial Service

results.description: The home of High Speed Two (HS2) Limited on GOV.UK. High Speed Two (HS2) Limited is the company responsible for developing and promoting the UK’s new high speed rail network. It is funded by grant-in-aid from the government.
results.title: High Speed Two (HS2) Limited

results.description: The home of Department for International Trade on GOV.UK. We secure UK and global prosperity by promoting and financing international trade and investment, and championing free trade.
results.title: Department for International Trade

results.description: The home of Competition and Markets Authority on GOV.UK. We work to promote competition for the benefit of consumers, both within and outside the UK. Our aim is to make markets work well for consumers, businesses and the economy.
results.title: Competition and Markets Authority

results.description: The home of Education and Skills Funding Agency on GOV.UK. The ESFA brings together the former responsibilities of the Education Funding Agency (EFA) and Skills Funding Agency (SFA) to create a single agency accountable for funding education and skills for children, young people and adults.
results.title: Education and Skills Funding Agency

results.description: The home of Rail Accident Investigation Branch on GOV.UK. The Rail Accident Investigation Branch (RAIB) independently investigates accidents to improve railway safety, and inform the industry and the public.
results.title: Rail Accident Investigation Branch

results.description: The home of Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport on GOV.UK. The Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport (DCMS) helps to drive growth, enrich lives and promote Britain abroad. We protect and promote our cultural and artistic heritage and help businesses and communities to grow by investing in innovation and highlighting Britain as a fantastic place to visit. We help to give the UK a unique advantage on the global stage, striving for economic success.

Department for
Digital, Culture,
Media & Sport
organisations.title: Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport

results.title: Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport

results.description: The home of Department for Exiting the European Union on GOV.UK. We are responsible for overseeing negotiations to leave the EU and establishing the future relationship between the UK and EU.

organisations.logo_formatted_title:
Department
for Exiting the
European Union
organisations.title: Department for Exiting the European Union

results.title: Department for Exiting the European Union

results.description: The home of Planning Inspectorate on GOV.UK. The Planning Inspectorate deals with planning appeals, national infrastructure planning applications, examinations of local plans and other planning-related and specialist casework in England and Wales.
results.title: Planning Inspectorate

results.description: The home of HM Treasury on GOV.UK. HM Treasury is the government’s economic and finance ministry, maintaining control over public spending, setting the direction of the UK’s economic policy and working to achieve strong and sustainable economic growth.
results.title: HM Treasury

results.description: The home of Maritime and Coastguard Agency on GOV.UK. We work to prevent the loss of life on the coast and at sea. We produce legislation and guidance on maritime matters, and provide certification to seafarers.
results.title: Maritime and Coastguard Agency

results.description: The home of Court of Protection on GOV.UK.
results.title: Court of Protection

results.description: The home of Natural England on GOV.UK. We’re the government’s adviser for the natural environment in England, helping to protect England’s nature and landscapes for people to enjoy and for the services they provide.
results.title: Natural England
